channel.title: Installing on other brand routers
channel.description:
Sorry if this is a stupid question but I was wondering if it is possible to install smooth WAN on a different brand router? For example open WRT can be installed on a Netgear R7800. Does the same concept apply to installing smoothwan on the R7800, since it is compatible with a openWRT install?
Thanks

item.title: Installing on other brand routers
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
SmoothWAN contains customization for each hardware unfortunately, I’ve heard that Speedify is going to add OpenWrt support soon which should work with official OpenWrt build.
I don’t have the device to add support.

Read full topic
